text:
Rstor | Appliance Developer | Bay Area | Full-time Onsite | http://www.rstor.io

As a part of rstor, I'm building a computational task appliance that can deploy user jobs for enterprise and high performance compute. Think: something that lets a company that needs to be walled off easily deploy "serverless" utilities.

Especially looking for experience in enterprise lifecyle utilities, like SNMP, but generally hiring "backend devs". stack is largely in go and elixir.

Contact: isaac - at - rstor - dot - io
